item.title: The gap between low- and high-performing students in the US has never been wider
item.description: New results from a national exam find that Americaâ€™s children have continued to lose ground on reading skills in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic and have made little improvement in math.

item.title: Flawed emergency alert systems lagged when residents needed them most during Los Angeles wildfires
A $4B settlement for Hawaii wildfire victims is in legal limbo as an unusual trial starts
